title: For Those We Love ( 2007 ) DVD Rip; Japanese; English Subtitles
description:
DVD Rip (dual-layer) of the 2007 Japanese film "Ore wa, kimi no tame ni koso shini ni iku" / "For Those We Love".

Audio: Japanese & Cantonese 

Note: By default it will play the dubbed Cantonese soundtrack; you will need to switch it to the original Japanese. Japanese soundtrack is in 5.1 DTS. 

Subtitles: English, Traditional Chinese, & Simplified Chinese


Highly recommended to anyone interested in World War 2 films from a non-Hollywood/Western perspective.  

Trailers can be found on youtube; seach for "For Those We Love".


This is my first upload to TPB (hopefully everythin was done right). I&#039;ve ripped it to be region-free. It looks excellent upscaled via my PS3. Enjoy.
